message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would really benefit you. I'm asking for $200 to start.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $200 might have been a little high, but $120 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I'm still interested in the product, but $160 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
